mdRecord.dcterms:title: Visiting speaker Helene Cixous
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bromley, Ann [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt: "I deal with the mysteries of everyday life, of being human," said Helene Cixous, reputed to be one of France's greatest living writers. Visiting the Commonwealth Center for Literary and Cultural Change from September 14 through September 26, 1992, she led an intensive graduate seminar for two weeks, gave a public lecture and held a one-day conference on writing. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
